mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ts_post ( ORG_ID, PARENT_ID, POST_PATH, POST_NAME, POST_DESC, AVALIABLE, CREATE_BY, UPDATE_BY, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, DELETE_MARK ) VALUES ( #{orgId}, #{parentId}, #{postPath}, #{postName}, #{postDesc}, #{avaliable}, #{createUser}, #{updateUser}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{deleteMark} )
mapper.update: update ts_post set ORG_ID=#{orgId}, PARENT_ID=#{parentId}, POST_PATH=#{postPath}, POST_NAME=#{postName}, POST_DESC=#{postDesc}, AVALIABLE=#{avaliable}, update_by = #{updateUser}, update_time=#{updateTime} where ID=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT ID, ORG_ID, PARENT_ID, POST_PATH, POST_NAME, POST_DESC, AVALIABLE, CREATE_BY, UPDATE_BY, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, DELETE_MARK FROM ts_post where delete_mark=0
select ID, ORG_ID, PARENT_ID, POST_PATH, POST_NAME, POST_DESC, AVALIABLE, CREATE_BY, UPDATE_BY, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, DELETE_MARK from ts_post where ID=#{id}
